changeSet.sql:
-- Insert Expense Items with their Expense Item Type relationships -- expense_item_type_id references are based on the codes from 026-seed-expense-item-types.xml -- 000000001 = Tangible Costs -- 000000002 = Labor Costs -- 000000003 = Other Direct Costs -- 000000004 = Cost of Goods Sold -- 000000005 = Other Expenses -- 000000006 = Depreciation Costs
INSERT INTO expense_items (description, expense_item_type_id, resource_type, is_active) VALUES ('Cost of Materials', (SELECT expense_item_type_id FROM expense_item_types WHERE code = '000000004'), 'INVENTORY_ITEM', true), ('Depreciation Costs', (SELECT expense_item_type_id FROM expense_item_types WHERE code = '000000006'), 'FIXED_ASSET', true), ('Equipment', (SELECT expense_item_type_id FROM expense_item_types WHERE code = '000000001'), 'ALL', true), ('Exchange Rate Differences', (SELECT expense_item_type_id FROM expense_item_types WHERE code = '000000005'), 'ALL', true), ('Finance Expense', (SELECT expense_item_type_id FROM expense_item_types WHERE code = '000000005'), 'ALL', true), ('Labor Costs', (SELECT expense_item_type_id FROM expense_item_types WHERE code = '000000002'), 'MANPOWER', true), ('Other Operating Expenses', (SELECT expense_item_type_id FROM expense_item_types WHERE code = '000000005'), 'ALL', true), ('Overheads', (SELECT expense_item_type_id FROM expense_item_types WHERE code = '000000003'), 'ALL', true), ('Profit (Loss) of Previous Years', (SELECT expense_item_type_id FROM expense_item_types WHERE code = '000000005'), 'ALL', true), ('Provisional & Contingency', (SELECT expense_item_type_id FROM expense_item_types WHERE code = '000000003'), 'ALL', true), ('Sub Contract', (SELECT expense_item_type_id FROM expense_item_types WHERE code = '000000003'), 'SERVICE', true), ('Tangible Costs', (SELECT expense_item_type_id FROM expense_item_types WHERE code = '000000001'), 'ALL', true), ('Transportation', (SELECT expense_item_type_id FROM expense_item_types WHERE code = '000000003'), 'ALL', true);
